entry.title: VPS - BHS6 - host375716
entry.content:
Jun 20, 19:09 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 20, 13:03 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host375716

entry.title: [Lim][Private/Public Network] - L115B10
entry.content:
Jun 20, 18:54 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 20/06/2023 17:00 UTC
End time : 20/06/2023 18:39 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the cooling.

Jun 20, 18:43 UTC
Update - Our technicians are recovering the ip addresses.

Jun 20, 18:38 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 20, 18:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/06/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][Additionnal services] - End of Life - RTM package
entry.content:
Jun 20, 12:45 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 12, 09:51 UTC
Update - -

May 23, 08:54 UTC
Update - Since March 30, 2022, the service for displaying data related to your server activity has been deprecated.
The service stopped working for servers that already had it installed until June 30, 2022.
After that date, we discontinued the feature, so server activity data is no longer displayed.
However, this will not affect the operation of servers that have already installed the service.

May 17, 13:15 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 17, 13:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/05/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : The RTM package has been decommissioned from last-public-ovh-rtm.snap.mirrors.ovh.net.
It won't be possible to install or update it anymore.
